search_results.title: The Silver Professors
search_results.snippet: The Silver Professorships are one of the University's highest honors: the most prestigious named professorship NYU can offer its faculty.

search_results.title: Leon Silver
search_results.snippet: Leon Theodore "Lee" Silver (April 9, 1925 – January 31, 2022) was an American geologist who was professor of geology at the California Institute of Technology ...

search_results.title: Charles M. Silver | Faculty - Texas Law
search_results.snippet: Charles Silver teaches courses on civil procedure, health law, and professional responsibility. His current research focuses on aggregate lawsuits.
